channel.title: CVE Feed for YAS Global Team -- Permalinks Customizer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for YAS Global Team -- Permalinks Customizer

item.title: CVE-2023-47773|2023-11-22T22:05:14.688Z -- yas%20global%20team -- permalinks%20customizer
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in YAS Global Team Permalinks Customizer plugin <= 2.8.2 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-45103|2023-10-12T14:33:33.651Z -- yas%20global%20team -- permalinks%20customizer
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in YAS Global Team Permalinks Customizer plugin <= 2.8.2 versions.
